sourcesContent:
import React from 'react' import '../styles/tour-details.css' import { Container, Row, Col, Form, ListGroup} from 'reactstrap' import {useParams} from 'react-router-dom' import tourData from '../assets/data/tours' import calculateAvgRating from '../utils/avgRating' const TourDetails = () => { const {id} = useParams() //this is a static data later we will call API and load our data from database const tour = tourData.find(tour=> tour.id === id) //destructure properties from tour object const {photo, title, desc, price, address, reviews, city, distance, maxGroupSize} = tour const {totalRating, avgRating} = calculateAvgRating(reviews) return ( <>

{title}

{calculateAvgRating == 0 ? null : avgRating} {totalRating == 0 ? ( 'Not Rated' ) : ( ({review?.length}) )} {address}
{city} {price}/per person {city}
) } export default TourDetails
